lender.name: Janet

lender.occupational_info: my job is to keep up standards of care, and report that standard to governing bodies. It is administrative.

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Managing Editor of Dog's Eye View Media and I write and produce articles and books on volunteerism.

lender.name: David and Ruth
lender.loan_because: We like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: David - I am a software engineer. Ruth - I am a wife and mother of three young children.

lender.name: Our Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves

lender.name: Julio
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help eradicate poverty worldwide. The only way to accomplish this is to stimulate the economies of local communities and promote self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time student at the University of Connecticut.

lender.name: Dan Anderson
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: Perpetually amazed by the things people do both to and for each other.

lender.name: Sudie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed
lender.occupational_info: I am a deacon in the Episcopal Church. As a deacon, I bring the needs of the world to the church and encourage others to use their skills to help those in need.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: It's a productive, self sustaining way of helping the world. It is a step towards self organized culture, as opposed to top down control.
lender.occupational_info: I study science.

lender.name: sjbeebe
lender.loan_because: I believe loans teach greater skills such as stewardship, as well as a give people a sense of responsibility and purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I provide opportunity, as well as facilitate activities for others to learn things.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: it helps me to keep perspective in my own life and do something to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs so that people can keep beautiful memories of their lives.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Small loans can make a real difference in the lives of people.
lender.occupational_info: I sell my art work in large regional events in my state and neighboring states. I have a tent and travel overnight. My art work is glass fused to metal, often jewelry. I also make sewed boxes with patchwork.

lender.name: IRENE
lender.loan_because: I used to typically spend $25 on coffee in one week, but now my $25 is helping someone in the world succeed. That is more rewarding than any cup of coffee.
lender.occupational_info: I repair the equipment that makes Intel processors which enhance worldwide connectivity.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of the underdog!
lender.occupational_info: I help people with diabetes live healthy & inspired lives, and work with a Johnson & Johnson company that makes insulin pumps.

lender.name: Lucas & Amanda
lender.loan_because: Our parents showed us how important it is to help out others.
lender.occupational_info: We are in grade school and hope to be entrepreneurs oursleves someday.

lender.name: Elsa
lender.loan_because: I'm able to and it's a wonderful way to give help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher for students who are blind or very low vision.

lender.name: Gary & Cindi
lender.loan_because: It feels right.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging

lender.name: Johnston Family
lender.loan_because: We decided at Christmas that we would find it more rewarding to contribute to a charity rather than exchange gifts in the future. This will be our ongoing fund that we hope can impact many lives.

lender.name: Aleks
lender.occupational_info: Interesting.

lender.name: Hattie & Jim
lender.loan_because: Life has been very good to us and we want to extend opportunities to others around the world.

lender.name: Jim and Marlene
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe we were put on this earth to make a difference in the lives of others. We are drawn to Mongolia because it's similar to Alaska in many ways.
lender.occupational_info: We work for a government agency that is responsible for preserving and managing public land for future generations.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I sing - because I am happy - I sing because I am free...for Him, for you, for me...

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Consultant.

lender.name: Elise
lender.occupational_info: I do the administration for Save the Children Australia's international programs

lender.name: Jeff,Amy,Clay,Savannah
lender.loan_because: I care. We need to be better

lender.name: Annabelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering and enabling others will help create a viral affect to make a better world and help others realize their full potential
lender.occupational_info:
I work on strategy and business development which means that I help define markets and opportunities for businesses. I spend a lot of my time working with small businesses and raising funds for non-profits to help different causes.
I grew up on a small farm in France and appreciate how much work it takes for families to subsist. I believe music, art and education are essential for life.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave this to me for Christmas. But we will do it again.
lender.occupational_info: Gates, Fences ,Ornimental Iron

lender.name: Leanne Pon
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their finances to buy a home and build future security for their family.

lender.name: Chad & Julie
lender.loan_because: We want to give gifts that make a difference an in individual's life. Looking to share gifts that we have been blessed with and empower those around us.

lender.name: Adrea
lender.loan_because: I have so much. I have been so lucky. People have been there for me. I want to return the favor, the compassion, and the love.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college. My husband helps people cope.

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: I have enough to live comfortably. I also believe that westerners (that includes me) have become wealthy partly by exploiting other peoples. Kiva loans are a small way to create flow in the other direction.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.occupational_info: I study at institute as the engineer of welding manufacture.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to have a fair shot at leaving behind a legacy.
lender.occupational_info: I travel the US buying precious metals for melt.

lender.name: PHONE
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO START TO DO OWNED BUSINESS

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ingenuity and capacity for positive change within every fellow person on our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I help injured and ill people recover their physical abilities, such as walking.

lender.name: Pacelearning
lender.loan_because: we believe in developing people! We are excited about the opportunity to play a part in helping people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: paceLearning specialises in Leadership development for the leaders and developing leaders within organisations.

lender.name: Emery
lender.loan_because: I would like to help the young and ambitious.
lender.occupational_info: Personal Injury Lawyer

lender.name: Stu...
lender.loan_because: i think it's an amazing concept...
lender.occupational_info: I organise maintenance, refurbishment and rebuilding of public housing.

lender.name: Nick Crawley
lender.loan_because: I feel privileged to be in control of my finances and to live in a wonderful place and want to make life a little easier for others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a company that assists other companies work out the value of undertaking a project such as building a power station or a mine...

lender.name: Dan A
lender.loan_because: As a atheist / humanist I know that their is no god that is going to help people, so I help my fellow humans because that is what I would want someone to do for me if I were in need.
lender.occupational_info: I share my 20 years of business experience with the next generation as my way to give back to the world for all of the opportunities I have received.

lender.name: Townsend-Joyce Family
lender.occupation: A professional couple with 2 children under 7
lender.loan_because: microloaning seems to us the perfect way to make sure our small amount of money brings the maximum benefit to those who need it. We love the idea.

lender.name: Kim & Scott
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us & continiously ensures we have all we need to be able to take care of our own children & financial committments. Helping other families is really a blessing to our family. We are thankful to our Lord Jesus Christ to be able to provide a small contribution through a mirco loan.
lender.occupational_info: Kim - I am a homemaker, caring for two little girls I also studying part time in the area of Justice and hope to go onto University to study law in 2011. Scott - I am a Hydrographic Survey Operator in the Royal Australian Navy. We are responsible for the mapping of the ocean floor and providing mapping for Maritime Australia, this helps in providing information for coastal operations.

lender.name: Sacrebleuwine
lender.occupational_info:
Sacre Bleu may be a classic term, but its a modern drink. Its trendy and artistic, created for wine drinkers of the same personality.
Its the casual sophistication of a night out on the town at a jazz concert or gallery opening. Its the much-needed laughter during a nightcap with friends after a long day on the job. Its the maturity of a dinner party in your first place. Sacre Bleu captures the creative atmosphere of the world's finest wines. Pour out simple sophistication at any occasion with Sacre Bleu.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea to help people out. Times are tough and everyone needs more money. But for those of us who have the ability to sacrifice a total of a meal or two out in order to help finance someone's business, I think we should do it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a geek/nerd/dork and proud of it. I work in the IT field and test software. I also dance West Coast Swing.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: its a fantastic cause.
lender.occupational_info: Working in the content team for the online travel agent sunshine.co.uk

lender.name: Shannah
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do the same for me and because I appreciate people who want to work to support themselves and their families. This is my way of showing some of that appreciation.
lender.occupational_info: I help people gain and retain functional strength, balance and agility through weight training, yoga, Budokon and free movement, so that they can lead a productive, healthy and active life.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: other people need money more than me.
lender.occupational_info: I read, I write, I read some more, and then I play the ukulele.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their potential

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed to have the means to make a difference in the lives of others by supporting women around the world.

lender.name: Sven
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, bit by bit

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to see the world as a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I create art to promote business and educational purposes.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have been given
lender.occupational_info: I help families make agreements so then they can have more peaceful homes. I do this because a peaceful home with no conflict or less arguing is a happier home for children and for parents as well.

lender.name: Jacinthe
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to providing the financing required to support those who seek to improve their lifestyle through opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I manage information technology projects.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I loan on behalf of a group of co-workers, who collectively decided to forego a holiday gift exchange and put the money towards a cause to benefit as many people as possible with direct reach and visibility.

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone less fortunate than myself and feel that a loan will give the borrower a much better incentive to succeed than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I have reached retirement age but work full time in a drug treatment and homeless project as an administrator and complementary therapist.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I know that I am very blessed to be born in a family which was able to send me to college, and I was given a good mind by God, and He has allowed me to have a job and make my own money. I want to share that with others who don't have those same blessings that I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, working in an elementary school.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to this site by my wee sis who is a star and I really felt so good about it Loan monies that are repaid can then be re-lent to those so much more underprivledged than ourselves Great Idea

lender.name: Edenbrook Hill P.S. (5A)
lender.loan_because: I want to help out entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are Grade Five students who inspired our classmates to fundraise for this cause.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about managing money

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people Fix their mortgage Loans and Save their Homes.

lender.name: Laura - Student Ireland
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves!

lender.name: Disha and Pankaj
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out and touch lives all over the world. To make a difference in peoples lives and in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Police Officer

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can and because it seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office. I help keep track of how my employer is spending money.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I consider myself a very lucky person. I have medical care, food on the table and a good job. I want to help the ones that arent as lucky as me, to have a better life. I hope, deep from my heart that the loans help the entrepreneurs , their family and friends. Thats my only wish !

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: A desire to help others

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
I write grants and do ethnography for a start-up non-profit called Iridescent.
On the side, I write for the Boston Globe's Green Blog and make sock monkeys.

lender.name: Ilsa
lender.occupational_info: I run classroom studies in K-12 schools to find out more about how children learn math and science. Most of these studies use computer programs and/or games to teach.

lender.name: Marlaena
lender.loan_because: to bring real help and hope to people around the world and to respond to God's blessings and generosity
lender.occupational_info: a forty-something follower of Jesus, who desires to walk faithfully and fruitfully in God's ways

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good and effective way of helping people. I have my own company and know how important it is to have money to run a company, how small it is.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own company

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: my high school teacher inspired me to care about others and help where I can
lender.occupational_info: I study as hard as I can to become as succesfull as I can

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to share possibilities of freedom and happiness. I feel happy knowing my resources can be used over and over again in different parts of the world. Empowering people! I am grateful to be a part of Kiva!
lender.occupational_info:
I work with large computers that stores information in databases.
Databases are like gigantic buckets of vegetables. Sometimes my boss wants to count how many carrots there are, or how many peas -- and then he wants to know if everyone will be able to get two carrots and fifteen peas each, put them on plates and sort them from the smallest to the largest pea, and end with the carrots...

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: it is possible.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: A better world requires a better educated population.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze stuff...

lender.name: Evelyn and George
lender.occupation: retired teachers active small scale farmers

lender.name: Scott Asher
lender.loan_because: I love people and I want to help the "least of these" as in Matthew 25:34-36, "Then the King will say to those on his right, 'Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world. For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.'"

lender.name: Jamey
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus.

lender.name: FISGroup,Inc
lender.loan_because: I want to invest in tomorrow's leaders!
lender.occupational_info: Asset Management

lender.loan_because: I love Jesus and I love people.

lender.name: Sarah J
lender.loan_because: I can help someone who needs it - why not help a stranger?

lender.name: Ronn
lender.loan_because: Ronn Torossian is the Founder, President and CEO of 5W Public Relations. Torossian is one of the leading public relations experts in the U.S. and has been referred to by Fox News as a "high-powered PR CEO." http://www.5wpr.com/about5wpr/management.cfm#1

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to help others to fulfill their dreams and ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I promote websites.

lender.name: Jerry and Lorraine
lender.occupation: Jerry and Lorraine were just plain FABULOUS!!
lender.loan_because: It seemed like a good idea to Jerry when someone suggested it. I feel very lucky to have known Jerry for a short time, and I'm honored to be able to continue this Kiva account in memory of he and his darling wife. I plan to make loans to people that I think they would have been interested in...! Eeeek! No pressure!

lender.name: Pixeldreher
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to help other people :-)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and this is a way to do that.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: as a result of the great birthing lottery some people need a little more friggin money to live, whilst some can toss that amount of money away daily.
